parameters.name: file_path

files.description: This module provides functionality for preprocessing and normalizing Arabic text. It includes functions to remove diacritics and normalize specific Arabic letters according to certain rules. The module is designed to standardize Arabic text for further processing in NLP or text analysis applications.

functions.name: remove_diacritics
functions.description: Removes all Arabic diacritical marks (tashkeel) from the input text. These marks include fatha, kasra, damma, sukun, shadda, and other vowel marks that appear above or below letters in Arabic script. The function uses regular expressions to identify and remove these marks.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The original Arabic text containing diacritics that need to be removed.

functions.name: normalize_arabic_letters
functions.description: Normalizes specific Arabic letters in the given text according to contextual rules. It specifically handles two cases: 1) Converting the Arabic letter 'ى' (alef maqsura, U+0649) to 'ي' (yeh, U+064A) only when it appears as a standalone word, and 2) Converting the Arabic letter 'ة' (teh marbuta, U+0629) to 'ه' (heh, U+0647) when it appears at the end of words. This normalization helps standardize text variations that are semantically equivalent in Arabic.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The Arabic text to be normalized.

files.description: Module for analyzing the Quran text for hidden patterns and anomalies. Provides a rich set of functions for text analysis including word frequency, root word extraction, n-gram (bigram) analysis, verse repetition detection, palindrome analysis, Abjad numeral computation, semantic symmetry, and detailed Muqatta'at analyses.

functions.name: analyze_text
functions.description: Analyzes the given text for hidden numerical patterns and anomalies. Returns a list of anomaly messages if any pattern is detected.

functions.name: analyze_word_frequency
functions.description: Performs word frequency analysis on the provided Quran text. Returns a summary string and a list of flagged unusual word messages.

functions.name: analyze_root_words
functions.description: Performs Arabic root word analysis on the provided Quran text. Returns a formatted summary, a dictionary of root frequencies, and a list of top roots.

functions.name: analyze_bigrams
functions.description: Generates n-gram (default: bigram) frequency analysis from a list of tokenized words. Returns a dictionary of n-gram tuples and their frequencies.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: The number of words in each n-gram (default is 2).

functions.name: analyze_verse_repetitions
functions.description: Analyzes verse repetitions within each Surah and across the entire Quran. Returns a dictionary with keys 'within_surah' and 'across_quran' detailing repetition data.

parameters.name: preprocessed_text
parameters.description: The preprocessed Quran text where each line represents a verse.

functions.name: analyze_lemmas
functions.description: Performs lemma analysis on the Quran text using a morphological analyzer. Returns a formatted summary of the top lemmas.

functions.name: analyze_surah_verse_counts
functions.description: Analyzes and logs the number of verses per Surah from the Quran text. Returns a formatted summary of verse counts.

functions.name: analyze_verse_lengths_distribution
functions.description: Calculates and analyzes the distribution of verse lengths per Surah, flagging Surahs with consistent verse lengths based on a threshold. Returns a dictionary mapping Surah numbers to their average, standard deviation, and consistency flag.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The preprocessed Quran text with each line representing a verse.

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: Standard deviation threshold to consider a Surah as consistent (default is 2).

functions.name: analyze_palindromes
functions.description: Identifies word-level palindromes within each verse of the Quran. Returns a list of tuples with Surah, Ayah and the palindromic word or phrase.

functions.name: analyze_abjad_numerals
functions.description: Performs Abjad numeral analysis on each verse by summing Arabic letter values. Returns a list of tuples with verse information and notable numerical patterns.

functions.name: analyze_semantic_symmetry
functions.description: Analyzes semantic symmetry by comparing word overlap between two halves of each Surah. Returns a list of findings per Surah.

functions.name: analyze_verse_length_symmetry
functions.description: Analyzes the symmetry of verse lengths between the first and second halves of each Surah. Returns a dictionary with metrics for both halves and a symmetry flag.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The preprocessed Quran text with each line representing a verse.

parameters.name: avg_threshold
parameters.description: Allowed difference in average verse lengths (default is 1.0).

parameters.name: stddev_threshold
parameters.description: Allowed difference in standard deviations of verse lengths (default is 1.0).

functions.name: analyze_enhanced_semantic_symmetry
functions.description: Performs enhanced semantic symmetry analysis using lemma overlap between two halves of each Surah. Returns a dictionary with symmetry scores and lemma sets.

parameters.name: symmetry_threshold
parameters.description: Minimum threshold for symmetry score (default is 0.3).

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat
functions.description: Analyzes Muqatta'at (mysterious letter sequences) in the Quran text. Returns a tuple containing a dictionary of extracted sequences by Surah and a Counter for letter frequencies.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_preceding_context
functions.description: Analyzes the verses immediately preceding Surahs with Muqatta'at for word frequency analysis. Returns a dictionary of word frequencies.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The preprocessed Quran text with each line in 'Surah|Ayah|Verse' format.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_themes
functions.description: Performs thematic analysis for Surahs with Muqatta'at by mapping each Surah to a predefined theme. Logs the results.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_context
functions.description: Analyzes the verses immediately following the Muqatta'at in Surahs and returns a dictionary of word frequencies.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_numerical_values
functions.description: Performs numerical analysis tailored to Muqatta'at in the Quran text and returns a placeholder summary string.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_root_cooccurrence
functions.description: Analyzes the co-occurrence of Muqatta'at with frequent root words within specified Surahs. Logs detailed JSON formatted results.

parameters.name: top_n
parameters.description: Number of top root words to consider (default is 5).

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_sequences
functions.description: Analyzes and counts the frequency of Muqatta'at sequences in the Quran text. Returns a dictionary with sequence frequencies.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_length
functions.description: Analyzes the lengths of Muqatta'at sequences in the Quran text and logs the frequency distribution along with unique occurrences.

functions.name: categorize_surahs_by_muqattaat
functions.description: Categorizes Surahs into those with and without Muqatta'at. Returns a tuple of two lists.

functions.name: analyze_grouped_root_frequencies
functions.description: Computes grouped Arabic root word frequencies for specified Surahs. Returns a dictionary mapping roots to their frequency counts.

parameters.name: surahs
parameters.description: List of Surah numbers (as strings) to include in the analysis.

functions.name: analyze_grouped_lemma_frequencies
functions.description: Computes grouped lemma frequencies for specified Surahs. Returns a dictionary mapping lemmas to their frequency counts.

parameters.name: surahs
parameters.description: List of Surah numbers (as strings) to include in the analysis.

functions.name: compare_surahs_muqattaat_vs_non_muqattaat
functions.description: Compares Surahs with and without Muqatta'at by computing average verse lengths and top word frequencies. Returns a dictionary summarizing the comparison.

functions.name: analyze_correlations
functions.description: Analyzes correlations across different analytical dimensions of the Quran text. Returns a list of correlation messages.

parameters.name: flagged_words
parameters.description: List of flagged words from frequency analysis.

parameters.name: enhanced_symmetry_data
parameters.description: Results from enhanced semantic symmetry analysis.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_distribution_meccan_medinan
functions.description: Analyzes the distribution of Muqatta'at across Meccan and Medinan Surahs using a provided classification dictionary. Returns a summary string.

parameters.name: surah_classification
parameters.description: Dictionary mapping Surah numbers to 'Meccan' or 'Medinan'.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_positions
functions.description: Analyzes the positions of Muqatta'at within the Quran text. Returns a placeholder summary string.

functions.name: generate_muqattaat_report
functions.description: Generates a comprehensive final report synthesizing all Muqatta'at analyses and logs the findings.

functions.name: review_muqattaat_report
functions.description: Reviews the final Muqatta'at report content and returns final conclusion messages on the mystery.

parameters.name: report_content
parameters.description: The complete content of the final Muqatta'at report.

functions.name: synthesize_muqattaat_analyses
functions.description: Synthesizes results from various Muqatta'at analyses to identify potential correlations and patterns. Logs any potential secrets found.

files.description: Module for logging analysis outputs of the Quran Secrets application. Provides functions to log secret findings, results, and bigram frequencies into a log file with timestamps.

functions.name: log_secret_found
functions.description: Logs a secret finding to the results.log file with a special tag and a timestamp.

functions.name: log_result
functions.description: Logs a result message to the results.log file with a timestamp.

functions.name: log_bigram_frequencies
functions.description: Logs the top N most frequent bigrams to the results log file including header and frequency counts for the top N bigrams.

parameters.name: bigram_frequencies
parameters.description: A dictionary mapping bigram tuples to frequency counts.

parameters.name: top_n
parameters.description: The number of top bigrams to log (default is 20).
